proposal: Hey $DECRYPT community! Noticed you're all about securing the digital realm with your bot and dapp for top-notch server and VPN services. With 275 holders on the ETH network, that's quite the secure crowd! 🛡️ How about we add some extra layers? Imagine deploying your own DEX or hosting a community lottery - all while keeping it as secure as your VPN services. Let's make the digital space not just secure, but also more rewarding.
